title: Job’s Character and First Test
summary: Job is introduced as a righteous and blameless man. Satan challenges Job’s faith, claiming he only serves God because of his blessings. God allows Satan to test Job by taking his possessions and children, but Job remains faithful.

faq.question: Who was Job?
faq.answer: A wealthy and upright man who feared God and turned away from evil.

faq.question: How did Job respond to his loss?
faq.answer: He mourned but worshiped, saying, 'The Lord gave and the Lord has taken away.'
